summary: Add a [Sound](/documentation/Sound) to the collection of registered [Sound](/documentation/Sound) components.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The unique name to associate with the [Sound](/documentation/Sound).

parameters.name: sound
parameters.description: The [Sound](/documentation/Sound) to add to the collection.

remarks: Any [Sounds](/documentation/Sound) created using the [createSound](/documentation/Engine/methods/createSound) method do not have to be registered using this method, as they are automatically registered.

platforms.names: Google Chrome, Mozilla FireFox, Internet Explorer 9+, Opera, Safari.
platforms.notes: The audio file formats supported varies between browsers. For a full list of formats and support visit [http://www.w3schools.com/html/html5_audio.asp](http://www.w3schools.com/html/html5_audio.asp).
